title: Ticket #7199: Monitor GPU memory usage per job
description:
LIGO is moving forward with multiple jobs using the same GPU, so they need per-job GPU usage information. Because over-committing memory is dangerous on GPUs (whereas over-committing compute is just slow), the emphasis is on memory usage, although I expect that core utilization will come along for free in any reasonable solution to this problem.

This will probably require a design document: neither TJ nor I particularly like the idea of trying to tie PIDs to jobs via the existing SlotMergeConstraint mechanism, and we expect there will be other benefits to moving the GPU-handling code inside the HTCondor codebase.
remarks:
Bumping up to priority 3.
